Package com.mlt.desktop.control

Class BorderPane

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
com.mlt.desktop.control.Pane
com.mlt.desktop.control.BorderPane
public class BorderPane
extends Pane
A border pane with top, left, bottom, right and center controls.
